CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oceanic Carriers relative to Cross-Border Trucks?
SRP.A: Oceanic Carriers is {below} Cross-Border Trucks in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oceanic Carriers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Air Express}.

VE.Q: What is Rail Networks's Cargo Shipments in 1991?
VE.A: Rail Networks's cargo shipments in 1991 is {155452.45} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is Air Express's Cargo Shipments in 1982?
VE.A: Air Express's cargo shipments in 1982 is {79428.08} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is QuickShip Logistics's Cargo Shipments in 1986?
VE.A: QuickShip Logistics's cargo shipments in 1986 is {122195.58} tons/month.

VE.Q: What are the cargo shipments of Cross-Border Trucks, Air Express, and Rail Networks in 1980?
VE.A: Cross-Border Trucks's cargo shipments is {91125.95} tons/month, Air Express's cargo shipments is {94657.47} tons/month, Rail Networks's cargo shipments is {100024.68} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cargo shipments is {15632.77} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cargo shipments is {552931.81} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Air Express?
EVJ.A: Air Express reached approximately {103798.43} tons/month in {1981}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Air Express?
EVJ.A: Air Express's lowest recorded level is approximately {15632.77} tons/month in {1994}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cargo Shipments?
SC.A: The average total cargo shipments is {837338.06} tons/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cargo Shipments exceed 893269.57 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cargo Shipments go below 754444.91 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cargo Shipments fall between 782664.38 and 865050.10 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1991, did the total Cargo Shipments experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1998?
NC.A: The change in total cargo shipments between 1981 and 1991 was {smaller} than between 1982 and 1998.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 1994 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 1994 was {lower} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 1992 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 1992 was {lower} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1998, did the total Cargo Shipments experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total cargo shipments between 1992 and 1998 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 1997.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oceanic Carriers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Air Express, Continental Freight, Parcel Services, Cross-Border Trucks, QuickShip Logistics, Rail Networks, Oceanic Carriers}.
